scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix server" "npm run dev --prefix web"
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix web
scripts.build:web: cross-env VITE_API_URL=http://localhost:3001 npm run build --prefix web
scripts.package:local: npm run build:web && pkg -t node18-win-x64 -o "dist/launcher/RV Sistema Empresa.exe" launcher/index.js
scripts.installer:local: npm run package:local && powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File installer/build-installer.ps1
